• Minimum Qualifications7+ years of applied experience in data engineering, business analytics, or business intelligence roles.
• Hands-on experience in Dataiku Data Modeling platform.
• Experience with data modeling, transformation, and analytics frameworks such as Snowflake.
• Skilled in building data visualizations using Tableau, and presenting insights to diverse audiences.

• Excellent communication and collaboration skills, including translating data insights for business stakeholders.
• Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative or technical discipline.
• Strong proficiency in SQL and R/Python (pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn).
